snippet: Gov. Jay Inslee on Wednesday proposed a cap-and-trade plan that would require industrial polluters to pay for every ton of carbon they release.
abstract: Washington State Gov Jay Inslee proposes cap-and-trade plan that would require industrial polluters to pay for every ton of carbon they release.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jay Inslee on Wednesday proposed a cap-and-trade plan that would require industrial polluters to pay for every ton of carbon they release.
